data.title: Another Subway convenient location
data.text: Subway has 3 locations in Sterling Heights MI.  Did you know Subway is one of the fastest growing franchises in the world, with 42,252 restaurants in 107 countries.  The sandwich chain surpassed the world's largest hamburger chain in terms of number of stores in the U.S. in 2002 and now it has taken the global lead. They must be doing something right.  I enjoy them for a quick reliable lunch or fast dinner on the run while traveling.
